Do parent plus loans qualify for cancellation?

Yes. Parent Plus loans are eligible under the forgiveness plan. 

If a parent received a Parent Plus loan on behalf of a student and the same student received a direct loan, BOTH can qualify for student loan forgiveness.

How long will the form take to fill out?

The form will take about 5 minutes to submit.

What information is needed to fill out the student debt forgiveness form?

Applicants will need to submit their name, Social Security number, date of birth, phone number, email, and attest to earning less than the income eligibility requirements.

When will my application be processed after submitting?

Your loan servicer will notify you when your relief has been processed. The Biden Admin has said that applicants will receive relief within 4 to 6 weeks after it begins processing applications.

When do I need to apply to receive forgiveness?

You can apply now or no later than December 21, 2023. But, the Admin recommends you apply before Nov 15 to have the form processed before the pause on federal student loan payments ends.

How do I know if I‚Äôm eligible to receive relief? 

You will qualify if you made less than $125,000 in 2021 or 2020 or families that made less than $250,000 in 2021 or 2020.

How much of my student loans will be cancelled?

Federal Pell Grant recipients will receive up to $20,000 and non-Pell Grant recipients will receive up to $10,000.

Where do I apply for student loan forgiveness?

You can apply now at https://studentaid.gov/debt-relief/application

The student debt relief application is now LIVE.
